oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Edwin Maxwell to Mary Cornelia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Edwin W. R. Maxwell (May 16, 1805 - August 15, 1873) to his daughter, Cornelia, on June 7, 1863, regarding her previous letter and being wounded by a shell on his right leg on May 14, 1863.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
